description: Project management tool for remote teams

input.idea: Async-first project management tool for remote FinTech teams (20-50 employees) that auto-generates daily standups from Slack/GitHub activity, reducing synchronous meetings by 60% and saving 10 hours per week per team.
input.targetMarket: Remote FinTech and SaaS companies (20-50 employees) in US/EU timezones with distributed engineering teams across 3+ timezones
input.problemStatement: Remote teams waste 10+ hours/week in synchronous status meetings due to timezone differences, causing burnout and reducing deep work time
input.solutionHypothesis: AI summarization of async work (Slack messages, Git commits, Jira updates) creates automatic status reports, eliminating need for daily standups

requiredElements: Specific metrics (60% meeting reduction, 10 hours saved per week)

qualityChecks.specificity: Should mention 60% meeting reduction, 10 hours/week savings, 3+ timezones
qualityChecks.geographic: Must identify US/EU markets, timezone distribution challenge
qualityChecks.actionability: Describe HOW it works (AI summarization, Slack/GitHub integration, auto-standups)
qualityChecks.avoidGeneric: No 'helps teams collaborate' - must specify async workflow automation, meeting reduction
